title: President Donald J. Trump is Restoring Public Safety for All Americans – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
February 28, 2017
THE PROBLEM: After decades of decline, crime is rising again in America’s largest cities.MAKING AMERICAN COMMUNITIES SAFE AGAIN: Since his inauguration, President Trump has followed through on his promise to the American people to prioritize public safety.RESPECTING LAW ENFORCEMENT: President Trump has made honoring and listening to law enforcement a priority.
